ygData.subject: Queynos Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... hehe. Yeah, I just went back and got those recently.  I was essentially a rat exterminator for a couple days.  :)  The thing that s irritating about this
ygData.messageBody:
>Another MUCH missed int item that you can do at level 12 is the golden
>stud earring.

hehe. Yeah, I just went back and got those recently. I was essentially a
rat exterminator for a couple days. :) The thing that's irritating about
this quest is that you have to wait for 3 random things:

1) Cubert doesn't spawn all the time
2) He doesn't always carry the quest item
3) When you bring the item to the NPC..he doesn't always give you the
earring.

How irritating is that? Is this supposed to be fun? ;)

-- Lim'Dul
